title: Feature Request: LLM Profile Management for OpenHands CLI
summary:
# Feature Request: LLM Profile Management for OpenHands CLI

## What problem or use case are you trying to solve?

Currently, the OpenHands CLI (`openhands-cli`) requires users to go through the configuration/settings pipeline every time they want to switch between different LLM models or providers.

title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

title: Alphanews
summary:
AI与设计的融合进入深水区，设计工具智能化与设计理念AI化并行。

WWDC25上Liquid Glass设计语言的推出，不仅预示着UI设计风格的转变，更引发了对现有设计工具及工作流的深刻反思。从AI辅助代码编写到AI驱动设计决策，设计领域正在经历一场由内而外的智能化革命。这对于设计师而言，意味着需要拥抱AI，将其作为设计流程中的得力助手，而非竞争对手。

希望能给你带来启发。下面是详细内容： 日报官网：alphanews.club，任何问题可咨询kiki220238。
